title: Apple to pay $490 million to settle allegations that it misled investors about iPhone sales in China
description: Apple has agreed to pay $490 million to settle a class-action lawsuit alleging CEO Tim Cook misled investors about a steep downturn in iPhone’s sales in China
keywords: Lawsuits, Legal proceedings, Business, Technology, U.S. news, General news, Article, 108163941
snippet: Apple has agreed to pay $490 million to settle a class-action lawsuit alleging CEO Tim Cook misled investors about a steep downturn in iPhone’s sales in China...
